name: Why Am I Playing This Game (Demo)
name_original: Why Am I Playing This Game (Demo)
description: little game I've been working on for a while in my IT academy. its not that great tho... only first level is finished, and you cant even go through third one so... the rendering isn't the best but I can't do much about that that's the engines fault and the controls aren't the greatest... (that's engines fault as well) I might follow up on it and move it to some other engine like unreal or godot but I don't know
